articles.title: (RUB USD) Ruble's Turbulent Week Reveals Russia Policy Divide - Bloomberg

articles.content:

articles.title: EU hits gas storage target before November deadline - Financial Times
articles.description: Prices likely to remain volatile as bloc lessens its dependence on Russian energy, analysts warn
articles.content:
The EU has hit its gas storage target more than two months ahead of schedule, but analysts warn that a cold winter could lead to volatile prices and Europe scrambling for energy.
